trans-unit.source: Represents the Assertion element specified in [Saml2Core, 2.3.3].
For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion"></xref> class with the specified issuer.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion.IssueInstant%2A> property is set to the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2NameIdentifier"></xref> that specifies the SAML authority that is making the claim(s) in the assertion.
[Saml2Core, 2.3.3].
issuer is `null`.

Gets or sets additional information related to the assertion that assists processing in certain situations but which may be ignored by applications that do not understand the advice or do not wish to make use of it.
[Saml2Core, 2.3.3]
The Advice element.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Advice"></xref> that contains additional information related to the assertion.
Gets a value that indicates whether this assertion was deserialized from XML source and can re-emit the XML data unchanged.

The default implementation preserves the source data when read using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityTokenHandler.ReadAssertion%2A> method and can re-emit the original data as long as the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion.Id%2A> property has not changed from the time that assertion was read.
It is very important that SAML assertions with different data have different IDs.
If implementing a scheme whereby an assertion "template" is loaded and certain bits of data are filled in, the Id must be changed.
`true` if this assertion can re-emit the XML source data unchanged; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the conditions that must be evaluated when assessing the validity of and/or when using the assertion.
[Saml2Core 2.3.3]
The Conditions element.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions"></xref> that contains the conditions.
Gets or sets the credentials used for encrypting the assertion.
The key identifier in the encrypting credentials is used for the embedded `EncryptedKey` in the `EncryptedData` element.
Returns <xref href="Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials"></xref> that represents the credentials.
Gets or sets a collection that contains any additional encrypted keys that are specified external to the EncryptedData element, as children of the EncryptedAssertion element.
A collection of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> that contains the keys.
Gets or sets the identifier for this assertion.
[Saml2Core, 2.3.3]
The ID attribute.
This attribute is required.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Id"></xref> that represents the identifier.
An attempt to set the property to `null` occurs.
Gets or sets the time instant of issue in UTC.
[Saml2Core, 2.3.3]
The IssueInstant attribute.
This attribute is required.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> that represents the time at which this assertion was issued in UTC.
The default is <xref href="System.DateTime.UtcNow"></xref>.
Gets or sets the identifier for the SAML authority that is making the claim(s) in the assertion.
[Saml2Core, 2.3.3]
The Issuer element.
This element is required.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2NameIdentifier"></xref> that specifies the issuer.
An attempt to set the property to `null` occurs.
The credentials used by the issuer to protect the integrity of the assertion.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials"></xref> that represents the credentials.
Gets a collection that contains the statements regarding the subject made in this assertion.

Elements in this collection can be of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AttributeStatement>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationStatement>, and/or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement> to represent each of the following SAML elements: AttributeStatement, AuthnStatement, and AuthzDecisionStatement.
A collection of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Statement"></xref> that contains the statements for this assertion.
Gets or sets the subject of the statement(s) in the assertion.
[Saml2Core, 2.3.3]
The Subject element.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject"></xref> that specifies the subject.
Gets the SAML version of this assertion.
[Saml2Core, 2.3.3]
The Version attribute; only version "2.0" is supported.
A string that contains the version.
Writes the source data, if available.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> with which to write the source data.
No source data is available
